title: when moving a folder where files are being uploaded itâ´s duplicated
body:
### expected behaviour
when you upload files from the web client in a folder an move this folder from the desktop client or from the mobile one, there should be just one folder

### actual behaviour
when you upload files from the web client in a folder an move this folder from the desktop client or mobile, the folder is duplicated 

### steps to reproduce
1. open the sync folder and a browser, access from them to same account
2. create a folder from the browser
3. from the web client upload several files in the folder "test"
4. from the desktop client move this folder "test" to another folder "a"
5. check that the folder is duplicated, i mean, you see the folder "test" on the root as well as inside the folder "a"


### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.12","versionstring":"5.0.7 rc2","edition":"enterprise"}
open suse 12.2 
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: chrome, ff
operating system:mac 10.8.3

### logs
```
fatal	 php	 sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked at /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php#961	 june 27, 2013 10:37
```
